item.title: 伦敦面临联合利华 170 亿欧元冰淇淋上市争夺战
item.description: 联合利华公司（Unilever Plc）在伦敦和阿姆斯特丹为其价值 170 亿欧元（184 亿美元）的冰淇淋业务的潜在上市拉开了竞争的序幕，这使得英国股票市场可能再次受挫。【原文：Unilever Plc kicked off a competition between London and Amsterdam for a potential listing of its €17 billion ($18.4 billion) ice cream business, raising the prospect of another setback for the UK’s equity market.】

item.title: 石油巨头称 "绿色转型 "乏力
item.description:
埃克森石油公司、阿美石油公司和其他行业重量级企业的高管表示，尽管ESG运动兴起，但老牌能源公司依然生机勃勃。【原文：

Executives from Exxon, Aramco and other industry heavyweights say old-line energy is alive and well despite the ESG movement.

】

item.title: 马科斯称菲律宾降息为时尚早，希望实现 8%的增长
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）表示，菲律宾还没有到应该开始降息的时候，他认为通货膨胀是菲律宾经济以东南亚最快速度扩张的主要担忧。【原文：President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said the Philippines hasn’t reached the point where it should start cutting interest rates, citing inflation as the main worry for an economy expanding at the fastest clip in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 瑞士前首席执行官安格恩表示，瑞士监管机构需要削减银行奖金的权力
item.description: 2013年3月12日星期二，瑞士伯尔尼，瑞士国旗在瑞士国会大厦联邦宫上空飘扬。瑞士央行在将其货币持有量增加近一倍以保护国家免受欧元区危机的影响之后，承诺继续捍卫法郎上限。摄影师：瓦伦丁-弗劳罗【原文：The Swiss national flag flies above the Federal Palace, Switzerland's parliament building in Bern, Switzerland, on Tuesday, March 12, 2013. The Swiss central bank pledged to keep up its defense of the franc cap after almost doubling its currency holdings to shield the country from the fallout caused by the euro zone's crisis. Photographer: Valentin Flauraud】

item.title: 美国银行莫伊尼汉称商业地产将 "缓慢燃烧
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）表示，银行业需要时间来解决商业房地产贷款的问题，此前纽约一家地区性贷款机构因面临问题债务而令投资者感到震惊。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said it’ll take time for the banking industry to work through issues with commercial real estate loans, after a New York regional lender alarmed investors with its exposure to troubled debt.】

item.title: 超微在市场反弹后提议出售 200 万股股票
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. is offering to sell 2 million shares of common stock in a public offering.】

item.title: 香水零售商道格拉斯将首次公开募股定价定在最低点
item.description: 随着欧洲上市步伐的加快，德国香水零售商道格拉斯股份公司（Douglas AG）首次公开募股的价格预计将在区间的底部。【原文：German perfume retailer Douglas AG is expected to price its €907 million ($991 million) initial public offering at the bottom of the range, as European listings pick up pace.】

item.title: 中国发布吸引外资行动计划
item.description: 在去年海外投资降至历史最低点之后，中国国务院发布了进一步向外国公司开放中国市场的行动计划。【原文：China’s State Council released an action plan to further open up the Chinese market to foreign firms after overseas investment fell to record lows last year.】

item.title: 房地产之痛正显现在一种不起眼的投资产品上
item.description: 一种用于为高风险房地产项目融资的不起眼的投资产品正面临着前所未有的压力，因为借款人正竭力偿还与商业地产项目相关的贷款。【原文：An obscure investment product used to finance risky real estate projects is facing unprecedented stress as borrowers struggle to repay loans tied to commercial property ventures.】

item.title: 沃伦敦促鲍威尔降低利率以帮助陷入困境的清洁能源公司
item.description: 参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）敦促美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）降低利率，称加息已经 "彻底扼杀了全国各地的主要可再生基础设施项目"。【原文：Senator Elizabeth Warren urged Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to cut interest rates, saying the hikes have “completely tanked major renewable infrastructure projects across the country.”】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。日本央行 17 年来首次加息，"YOLO "一族打赌本周英伟达（Nvidia）的价值可能翻番。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. The BOJ hikes for the first time in 17 years and the YOLO crowd bet Nvidia could double in value this week. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 超富裕人群对芝加哥最精英的街区产生了反感
item.description: 肯-格里芬离开芝加哥时，这位亿万富翁列出了他在黄金海岸（该市最高档的社区）的几处高档房产。【原文：When Ken Griffin left Chicago, the billionaire listed several of his high-end properties in the Gold Coast, the city’s most exclusive neighborhood.】

item.title: Blackstone 亿万富翁 Tony James 的家族办公室催生新公司
item.description: 托尼-詹姆斯（Tony James）的家族办公室催生了一家由黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.【原文：Tony James’ family office has spawned a private equity firm backed by the Blackstone Inc. billionaire that’s courting investment firms for other members of the world’s super-rich.】

item.title: 德国投资者对降息抱有希望，前景跃升至两年高点
item.description: 受欧洲央行准备在未来几个月内降息的预期推动，投资者对德国经济前景的信心跃升至两年多来的最高点。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economic outlook jumped to the highest in more than two years, driven by expectations that the European Central Bank is ready to cut interest rates in the coming months.】

item.title: 阿涅利旗下 Exor 携手投资青少年时尚品牌 Subdued
item.description: 包括意大利亿万富翁阿涅利家族在内的投资者收购了女装品牌 Subdued 的股份，该品牌是意大利青少年的时尚宠儿。【原文：Investors including Italy’s billionaire Agnelli family bought a stake in women’s fashion brand Subdued, a trendy favorite among Italian teens.】

item.title: 2023 年底欧元区劳动力成本增长放缓
阿达尼绿色公司称美国腐败调查与第三方无关
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd.）周二提交的一份股票文件显示，该公司尚未收到美国司法部的通知，尽管该公司知道正在对一个无关第三方可能违反美国反腐败法的行为进行调查。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd. has not received a notice from the US Department of Justice although it is aware that an investigation is underway for potential violations of American anti-corruption laws by an unrelated third party, according to a stock filing Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告乌干达反男女同性恋、双性恋和变性者的法律会危及计划目标
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告说，乌干达取缔同性恋的严苛法律正在破坏外国直接投资和旅游业的流入，损害了当局为实现其计划目标所做的努力。【原文：Uganda’s harsh law outlawing homosexuality is undermining foreign direct investment and tourism inflows, hurting attempts by authorities at meeting objectives under an International Monetary Fund program, the lender warned.】

item.title: 尼日利亚卡多佐支持上月更大幅度加息
item.description: 尼日利亚央行行长奥拉耶米-卡多佐（Olayemi Cardoso）投票支持比上个月更大幅度的利率上调，这证明他是尼日利亚央行货币政策委员会中最鹰派的成员之一。【原文：Nigerian central bank Governor Olayemi Cardoso voted for an even larger interest-rate increase than was delivered last month, confirming him as one of the most hawkish members on its monetary policy committee.】

item.title: 因电池需求放缓，SK Innovation 被 S&P 评为垃圾股
item.description: 由于电动汽车电池需求放缓和高资本支出将对其债务指标产生负面影响，SK Innovation 公司的信用评级被 S&P 下调为垃圾级。【原文：SK Innovation Co.’s credit rating was cut to junk by S&P as a slowdown in demand for electric vehicle batteries and high capital expenditures are set to negatively impact its debt metrics.】

item.title: 华平投资被指寻求赎回万达购物中心股权
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，华平投资集团正在寻求赎回其在大连万达集团股份有限公司购物中心部门的投资，该部门近年来曾多次尝试在香港上市，但均以失败告终，因此一直在努力筹集新的资金。【原文：Warburg Pincus is seeking to redeem its investment in Dalian Wanda Group Co.’s shopping mall unit, which has been trying to raise fresh funds after several failed attempts to list in Hong Kong in recent years, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美国银行削减香港办公空间，办公楼市场遭受重创
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）正在削减其位于香港中环地区总部的部分办公空间，这凸显了香港商业业主所面临的困境。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is cutting some office space in its headquarters in Hong Kong’s Central district, according to people familiar with the matter, underscoring the headwinds for the city’s commercial landlords.】

item.title: 马克龙再次推动巴黎对资本市场的吸引力
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）承诺将通过新一轮措施使巴黎成为资本市场的避风港，这些措施将为首次公开募股提供便利，并引导更多投资流向小型公司。【原文：Emmanuel Macron pledged to make Paris a haven for capital markets with a fresh round of measures that would facilitate initial public offerings and direct more investment to smaller companies.】

item.title: 交易所调查导致比特币跌至 8,900 美元的闪崩事件
item.description: 加密货币交易所 BitMEX 正在调查昨天导致其平台上比特币闪崩的异常交易活动。【原文：Crypto exchange BitMEX is investigating unusual trading activity that led to a flash crash in Bitcoin on its platform yesterday.】

item.title: 银行家大量涌入，华尔街奖金略有下降
item.description: 去年，华尔街的平均奖金略有下降，原因是在交易持续低迷的情况下，银行对薪酬进行了控制，而证券行业的员工人数也有所增加。【原文：The average Wall Street bonus dropped slightly last year as banks kept compensation reined in amid an ongoing deal slump and the number of employees working in the securities industry ticked up.】

item.title: 日本央行取消负利率，交易大厅一片欢腾
item.description: 当日本央行 17 年来首次提高利率时，从东京到新加坡的交易大厅里回荡着一个词："终于"。【原文：One word echoed across trading floors from Tokyo to Singapore as the Bank of Japan raised rates for the first time in 17 years — ‘finally’.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行将在 6 月决议中提供 "更多数据
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）重申，他和他的同事们将掌握更多信息，以便在 6 月份开会时决定利率。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos reiterated that he and his colleagues will have much more information to decide on interest rates when they meet in June.】

item.title: 瑞士钟表出口下滑，对中国大陆和香港的出货量减少
item.description: 随着奢侈钟表需求的降温，瑞士钟表月出口量出现了三年来的第二次下降，主要原因是中国和香港的出货量减少。【原文：Monthly Swiss watch exports fell for just the second time in three years, led by lower shipments to China and Hong Kong, as demand for luxury timepieces cools.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示风险偏好从美国科技股转向欧洲股市
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的最新基金经理调查显示，投资者正处于风险偏好情绪中，他们正在抢购欧洲和新兴市场的股票，而牺牲了美国和科技行业的股票。【原文：Investors are in a risk-on mood, and are snapping up stocks in Europe and emerging markets at the expense of the US and the technology sector, according to Bank of America Corp.’s latest fund manager survey.】
